title: Lifts head briefly during tummy time
description: Can lift head momentarily when placed on stomach, building neck strength.

title: Follows objects with eyes
description: Tracks moving objects or faces with their eyes from side to side.

title: Social smile
description: Smiles in response to parent's voice or face, showing social connection.

title: Coos and makes gurgling sounds
description: Produces vowel-like sounds and begins early vocalization.

title: Rolls from tummy to back
description: Can roll over from stomach to back independently.

title: Reaches for and grasps objects
description: Intentionally reaches for objects and holds them in hand.

title: Explores objects with hands and mouth
description: Investigates toys by mouthing, shaking, and banging them.

title: Babbles with consonant sounds
description: Produces consonant-vowel combinations like 'ba', 'da', 'ma'.

title: Sits without support
description: Can sit independently and maintain balance while playing.

title: Begins crawling
description: Starts to crawl on hands and knees or army crawl.

title: Understands object permanence
description: Looks for hidden objects, understanding they still exist when out of sight.

title: Shows stranger anxiety
description: Becomes wary of unfamiliar people, indicating secure attachment.

title: Pulls to stand
description: Uses furniture or people to pull themselves up to standing position.

title: Pincer grasp
description: Picks up small objects between thumb and forefinger.

title: Says first words
description: Speaks first meaningful words like 'mama', 'dada', or 'ball'.

title: Responds to simple requests
description: Understands and responds to simple instructions like 'give me' or 'come here'.

title: Walks independently
description: Takes independent steps and walks without holding onto anything.

title: Stacks 2-4 blocks
description: Can stack blocks on top of each other, showing fine motor development.

title: Vocabulary of 50+ words
description: Speaks approximately 50 or more words by age 2.

title: Engages in parallel play
description: Plays alongside other children, aware of them but not directly interacting.

title: Drinks from open cup
description: Can drink from a regular cup with minimal spilling.

title: Runs and climbs well
description: Runs confidently and climbs on playground equipment.

title: Uses 2-3 word sentences
description: Combines words into short phrases like 'want milk' or 'daddy go'.

title: Shows interest in toilet training
description: Indicates awareness of bodily functions and interest in using potty.

title: Sorts objects by shape/color
description: Can group objects by a single characteristic like color or shape.

title: Speaks in complete sentences
description: Uses sentences of 4-5 words with proper grammar most of the time.

title: Engages in cooperative play
description: Plays with other children, shares, takes turns, and follows simple game rules.

title: Counts to 10
description: Can count objects up to 10 with one-to-one correspondence.

title: Dresses independently
description: Can put on and remove most clothing items without help.

title: Recognizes letters of the alphabet
description: Can identify most uppercase letters by name.

title: Hops on one foot
description: Can hop on one foot for several hops, showing balance and coordination.

title: Shows empathy for others
description: Recognizes and responds to others' emotions with appropriate concern.

title: Follows rules and routines
description: Understands and follows household and classroom rules consistently.

title: Reads simple books
description: Can read age-appropriate books with basic sight words and phonics.

title: Basic addition and subtraction
description: Solves simple math problems within 20.

title: Makes and keeps friends
description: Develops stable friendships and navigates peer relationships.

title: Understands right from wrong
description: Has internalized basic moral concepts and can explain why actions are right or wrong.

title: Reads chapter books
description: Reads longer books with chapters and more complex vocabulary.

title: Multiplication and division basics
description: Understands multiplication/division concepts and begins learning facts.

title: Participates in organized sports
description: Engages in team sports with understanding of rules and teamwork.

title: Manages personal hygiene
description: Takes responsibility for daily hygiene routines with minimal reminders.

title: Abstract thinking emerges
description: Begins to think about hypothetical situations and abstract concepts.

title: Navigates peer pressure
description: Recognizes peer pressure and makes independent choices.

title: Takes responsibility for actions
description: Accepts consequences for mistakes and learns from them.

title: Understands puberty changes
description: Has age-appropriate knowledge about body changes during puberty.

title: Manages strong emotions
description: Develops strategies to cope with intense emotions and mood swings.

title: Critical thinking skills
description: Analyzes information, questions assumptions, and forms reasoned opinions.

title: Develops personal values
description: Begins forming own value system based on reflection and experience.

title: Career exploration
description: Explores interests and potential career paths through research and experiences.

title: Healthy relationship skills
description: Understands consent, boundaries, and healthy relationship dynamics.

title: Time management
description: Balances school, activities, social life, and responsibilities effectively.

title: Financial literacy basics
description: Understands budgeting, saving, and basic financial concepts.

title: College/career preparation
description: Actively prepares for post-secondary education or career entry.

title: Independent living skills
description: Can cook, clean, do laundry, and manage basic household tasks.

title: Demonstrates integrity
description: Acts according to principles even when no one is watching.
